member.name: WINHTTP_CONNECTION_INFO
member.summary: The WINHTTP_CONNECTION_INFO structure contains the source and destination IP address of the request that generated the response.

member.name: WINHTTP_CONNECTION_INFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the WINHTTP_CONNECTION_INFO structure.

member.name: WINHTTP_CONNECTION_INFO.LocalAddress
member.summary: A SOCKADDR_STORAGE structure that contains the local IP address and port of the original request.

member.name: WINHTTP_CONNECTION_INFO.RemoteAddress
member.summary: A SOCKADDR_STORAGE structure that contains the remote IP address and port of the original request.
